Reviews.Title: Good Value Works Great.
Reviews.Author: Hitech "Hitech 32"
Reviews.Content: Have ordered a total of 12 of theses. All work great. Most of mine are mounted in silcone sealed project boxes for outdoor camera mounts, and have been in operation for more than a year with out any problems. My longest runs are 500-680 feet, and they are as good and clear as the 100 foot runs with these Baluns. Any problems I had were mainly due to my rushing and making a minor wiring mistake. Thses work just as well as the Baluns ive used and seen for $5-30 dollars more.

ProductInfo.Name: Q1C1 1-Channel Passive Video & Power Transceiver
